name: AHU 150 CFM
description: Basic air handler with standard filter. Augments AC airflow and provides basic air cleaning.

flowCharacteristics.note: When connected in-line with AC, adds to total system airflow

filterType.name: Standard Pleated
filterType.description: Basic household filter. Captures dust, pollen, some mold spores. NOT effective against toxic gases.
limitations: Does NOT filter toxic gases (NH3, volatile organics)
Does NOT filter CO, CO2, or other small molecules
Requires activated carbon or HEPA upgrade for hazardous materials

filtrationEfficiency.note: Standard filter only removes particulates. Gases pass through.

targetComposition._H2O_note: Target ~50% RH at 20Â°C. Air handler can dehumidify if room humidity exceeds this.
